00051 typedef struct _UXML_ATTRIB {
00052     struct _UXML_ATTRIB *xmla_next;     
00053     char *xmla_name;            
00054     char *xmla_value;           
00055 } UXML_ATTRIB;

00060 typedef struct _UXML_NODE {
00061     struct _UXML_NODE *xmln_next;       
00062     struct _UXML_NODE *xmln_child;      
00063     struct _UXML_NODE *xmln_parent;     
00064     char *xmln_name;            
00065     UXML_ATTRIB *xmln_attribs;
